languages.text: "Так и будет. Никто не скажет, что Ульфар слишком труслив, чтобы пройти предначертанной ему кровавой тропой. Что хотя бы один враг, которому было суждено пасть от его руки, смог улизнуть от смерти, так как Ульфар был нетверд".
"And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."
languages.original_text: "Так и будет. Никто не скажет, что Ульфар слишком труслив, чтобы пройти предначертанной ему кровавой тропой. Что хотя бы один враг, которому было суждено пасть от его руки, смог улизнуть от смерти, так как Ульфар был нетверд".

traits.locale_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who couldn't walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single one out of His foes who were meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who couldn't walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single one out of His foes who were meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne faillirai pas. Personne ne pourra dire qu'Ulfar était un lâche, incapable d'arpenter la voie sanglante qui s'étendait devant lui. Personne ne pourra dire que ses adversaires, qui devaient succomber aux mains d'Ulfar, ont échappé à leur destin parce qu'il était trop faible. »
languages.original_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne faillirai pas. Personne ne pourra dire qu'Ulfar était un lâche, incapable d'arpenter la voie sanglante qui s'étendait devant lui. Personne ne pourra dire que Ses adversaires, qui devaient succomber aux mains d'Ulfar, ont échappé à leur destin parce qu'il était trop faible. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我会恪守我的职责。我不会让任何人说乌尔法是个懦夫，说他不敢在自己沾满血迹的道路上继续前进。我也不会让任何人说，由于乌尔法心志不坚，让敌人从他手下逃过了一劫。”
languages.original_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."

traits.locale_text: “我会恪守我的职责。我不会让任何人说乌尔法是个懦夫，说他不敢在自己沾满血迹的道路上继续前进。我也不会让任何人说，由于乌尔法心志不坚，让全父的敌人从他手下逃过了一劫。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「そうするつもりだ。誰もウルファーが血塗られた道を歩めなかった臆病者だとは言わないだろう。ウルファーが迷ったために破滅を免れた者など一人もいない」
languages.original_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."

traits.locale_text: 「そうするつもりだ。誰もウルファーが血塗られた道を歩めなかった臆病者だとは言わないだろう。ウルファーによって倒された敵のうち、ウルファーが迷ったために破滅を免れた者は一人もいない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Und das werde ich. Niemand wird behaupten können, dass Ulfar ein Feigling war, der den für ihn vorgesehenen Weg des Blutes nicht gehen konnte. Dass auch nur ein Feind, der durch Ulfars Hand fallen sollte, dem Untergang entkam, nur weil Ulfar zauderte."
languages.original_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."

traits.locale_text: "Und das werde ich. Niemand wird behaupten können, dass Ulfar ein Feigling war, der den für ihn vorgesehenen Weg des Blutes nicht gehen konnte. Dass kein einziger Seiner Feinde, die durch Ulfars Hand fallen sollten, dem Untergang entkommen konnte, nur weil Ulfar am Wanken war."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Y así lo haré. Nadie podrá decir que Ulfar fue un cobarde incapaz de recorrer el sangriento camino que se abría ante él. Que un solo enemigos condenado a caer por la mano de Ulfar escapó a su destino porque Ulfar vaciló».
languages.original_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."

traits.locale_text: «Y así lo haré. Nadie podrá decir que Ulfar fue un cobarde incapaz de recorrer el sangriento camino que se abría ante él. Que alguno de los enemigos que debían caer por la mano de Ulfar escapó a su destino porque Ulfar vaciló».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Öldüreceğim o hâlde. Ulfar'ın, önündeki kana bulanmış yolda yürümekten korktuğunu kimse iddia edemeyecek. Ulfar'ın kesmesi gereken hiçbir düşmanın, Ulfar tereddüte düştü diye sağ kaldığını kimse ileri süremeyecek."
languages.original_text: "And so I will. No one will say that Ulfar was a craven who could not walk the bloody path laid out for him. That a single foe meant to fall at Ulfar's hand escaped their doom because Ulfar wavered."

traits.locale_text: "Öldüreceğim o hâlde. Ulfar'ın önündeki kana bulanmış yolda yürümekten korktuğunu kimse iddia edemeyecek. Ulfar'ın kesmesi gereken hiçbir düşmanın Ulfar tereddüte düştü diye sağ kaldığını kimse ileri süremeyecek."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
